TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AuthenticationMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指示 Visual Basic 应用程序如何为 对象对用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Indicates how a Visual Basic application authenticates the user for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以通过将传递到此枚举值之一设置应用程序的身份验证模式构造函数。You can set the authentication mode for an application by passing one of this enumeration's values to the constructor. 有关详细信息，请参阅[扩展 Visual Basic 应用程序模型](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Extending the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/customizing-extending-my/extending-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 使用 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的 Visual Basic 应用程序可以指定是否使用 Windows 身份验证或自定义身份验证。A Visual Basic application that uses the Visual Basic Application Model can specify whether it uses Windows authentication or custom authentication. 你还可以在 Visual Studio 集成开发环境中配置的身份验证模式。You can also configure the authentication mode in the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode ApplicationDefined = int32(1)

summary.span: 构造函数不初始化该应用程序主线程的主体。

span.span: The constructor does not initialize the principal for the application's main thread.

summary.span: 所以应用程序需要初始化其主线程的主体。

span.span: The application needs to initialize the principal for the application's main thread.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.AuthenticationMode Windows = int32(0)

summary.span: 构造函数使用当前用户的 Windows 用户信息初始化该应用程序主线程的主体。

span.span: The constructor initializes the principal for the application's main thread with the current user's Windows user information.
